summary: When player enters the command he/she will be given nearly every ebony item that exists in the game
descriptionHtml:
[size=5]-Description-[/size]
This is a very small batch file that adds items that the [b]Ebony Warrior[/b] wold have in his pack

[size=5]-How to apply the File-[/size]
[size=3]Once in game bring up the console with "¬" then type the following into the console -[b]bat "Ebony Warrior"[/b]- then after a few seconds all items will be put into the players pack
[size=5]-Installation- [/size]
Go into your Skyrim's Game folder then from their u should see your launcher and other little bits and bobs their should be a DATA folder go into to this folder and simple drop the file into it and hey presto your done


[b]Beware: Don't use this on a Legit save and also u might wanna change the last value in the Misc section because its normally set to ten million simply change that number to your number of chose
[/b][/size]
author: Argothemurder
